title: september 25: the first anti-smoking psa
description:
Regardless of your habits, there’s no denying it...cigarettes are bad for you. But would you believe that we were actually warned about these adverse health effects as early as 1878? Talk about unheeded warnings! In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia takes us back to that fateful day in 1878 and also walks us through the history of tobacco and how it skyrocketed in popularity across the globe. Speaking of hype, Maia will also explore one very popular Pink Floyd record that was able to skyrocket on the US charts. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
